titles.title: 093 By Christ Redeemed In Christ Restored

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
by christ redeemed in christ restored
we keep the memory adored
and show the death of our blest lord
until He come

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
his body given in our stead
is seen in this memorial bread
and thus our feeble love is fed
until He come

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
his fearful drops of agony
his life-blood shed for us we see
this wine shall tell the mystery
until He come

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
until the trump of god be heard
until the ancient graves be stirred
and with His great commanding word
the lord shall come

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
oh blessed hope
with this elate
let not our hearts be desolate
but strong in faith and patience wait
until He come
